lyrics.ChnStr: 车赶著路回家 响不停的电话
lyrics.EngStr: The car rushes on the road back home, the phone keeps ringing

lyrics.ChnStr: 生活为谁匆忙 有个人爱啊
lyrics.EngStr: Life is rushing for someone, there's someone who loves

lyrics.ChnStr: 为谁出头买帐 听谁倾诉抒发
lyrics.EngStr: Who do you stand up for and pay for? Who do you listen to and confide in?

lyrics.ChnStr: 琐事总想到他 对 你爱著他
lyrics.EngStr: You always think about him in the trivial things, yes, you love him

lyrics.ChnStr: 他为她撑著伞 湿了半边肩膀
lyrics.EngStr: He holds the umbrella for her, his shoulder gets half wet

lyrics.ChnStr: 他甘愿变傻瓜 这就是爱啊
lyrics.EngStr: He's willing to be a fool, this is love

lyrics.ChnStr: 女孩剪短头发 男孩化了妆
lyrics.EngStr: The girl cuts her hair short, the boy puts on makeup

lyrics.ChnStr: 爱著这样的他（她） 不都是爱吗
lyrics.EngStr: Loving this kind of him (her), isn't this love?

lyrics.ChnStr: 嗜爱的动物啊 别怕
lyrics.EngStr: Loving animal, don't be afraid

lyrics.ChnStr: 我们都总得在这受点伤 是吧
lyrics.EngStr: We all have to suffer a little here, right?

lyrics.ChnStr: 让真正爱你的人陪著你 结痂
lyrics.EngStr: Let the one who truly loves you stay with you and heal the wounds

lyrics.ChnStr: 当天性毫无疑问的接纳 爱啊
lyrics.EngStr: When nature unquestioningly accepts love

lyrics.ChnStr: 嗜爱的动物啊 示爱的动物啊
lyrics.EngStr: Loving animal, showing love animal

lyrics.ChnStr: 哭了也别害怕 拥抱尽管大方
lyrics.EngStr: Don't be afraid to cry, embrace it generously

lyrics.ChnStr: 爱没什么方法 爱就是方法
lyrics.EngStr: There's no method to love, love itself is the method

lyrics.ChnStr: 我们其实一样 在小事中长大
lyrics.EngStr: We are actually the same, growing up in the little things

lyrics.ChnStr: 用不同的模样 学会了爱啊
lyrics.EngStr: Learning to love in different forms

lyrics.ChnStr: 嗜爱的动物啊 别怕
lyrics.EngStr: Loving animal, don't be afraid

lyrics.ChnStr: 我们都总得在这受点伤 是吧
lyrics.EngStr: We all have to suffer a little here, right?

lyrics.ChnStr: 让真正爱你的人陪著你 结痂
lyrics.EngStr: Let the one who truly loves you stay with you and heal the wounds

lyrics.ChnStr: 当天性毫无疑问的接纳 爱啊
lyrics.EngStr: When nature unquestioningly accepts love

lyrics.ChnStr: 嗜爱的动物啊 是爱的动物啊
lyrics.EngStr: Loving animal, is a loving animal
